attributes.action: Form a Special task force to irradicate the Grooming Gangs
attributes.additional_details:
Since this issue has been around for more than a decade, clearly there is some coverup going on by local agencies it may be due to corruption or political pressure. Hence existing agencies are not able to produce the results for benefit of the society especially in this regard. 

This task force should launch nationwide enquiry with the support of our Prime minister and the citizens who look up to our government to resolve such issues.
attributes.background: Form a special task force by bringing in best people from different investigation and Prosecution Services like Military, NCA ,Police, CPS , SOCA and YOTs specifically for the purpose of irradicating the grooming gangs. They should prosecute the individuals irrespective of the Political Stature

rejection.details:
There is currently a Grooming Gangs Taskforce in operation. Established in April 2023, this police taskforce collaborates with all 43 police forces in England and Wales to combat child sexual exploitation and grooming gangs.

More information: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/grooming-gangs-taskforce-arrests-hundreds-in-first-year
